title._content: [Private Thomas Green of Co. B, 11th Massachusetts Infantry Regiment in uniform]  (LOC)

description._content: Fancy & Shurtleff,, photographer. [Private Thomas Green of Co. B, 11th Massachusetts Infantry Regiment in uniform] 1861 April 22. 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.5 x 6.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-276. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photograph shows identified soldier who was killed on August 29, 1862, at the 2nd battle of Bull Run, Virginia. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Purchased from: Vin Caponi, Jr., Malverne, N.Y. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Green, Thomas,--approximately 1843-1861. United States.--Army.--Massachusetts Infantry Regiment, 11th (1861-1865)--People. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.33339 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2950
